description: schema for attribute definition; updated and revised for use in cordra from USGIN dataTypeJSON0.1 SMR 2017-04-21. Version 3.1
title: Attribute

prefLabel.title: Name
prefLabel.description: Name for this attribute. Implements dt:attributeName

alternateLabels.title: other designations for the attribute
alternateLabels.description: alternate names for labeling the entity in UI; name could be localized with an @ extension eg. tamanho@PT. Implements dt:localNames

dt:attributeMeaning.description: concept label and identifier that specifies the phenomenon quantified by the attribute, e.g.length, mass, concept, velocity. The value here will be related to the valid UOM for the value.
dt:attributeMeaning.title: Attribute semantics

dt:meaningPropertyURI.description: identifier for a data type (objectClass) entity concept
dt:meaningPropertyURI.title: Property Concept URI

dt:meaningPropertyPrefLabel.title: Property name
dt:meaningPropertyPrefLabel.description: human-readable label for the property represented by the attribute value

dt:attributeDataType.description: specifies the dataType for attribute values. Must be consistent with the valueDataType of an attributeDomain assigned to the attribute. Datatype is assigned by reference; complex dataType definitions are represented as separate objects inlucded in a dataType dictionary. the choices in the 'oneOf' section identify for the category of the dataType definition for the attribute value. In this implementation of the USGIN DataType model, represents the subtype of abstract DataType; possible values are PrimitiveType, DataObject, ArrayVariable (not implemented yet), Dictionary (not implemented) and List (not implemented)
dt:attributeDataType.title: Attribute Data Type

dt:dataTypeLabel.description: free text label for humans to understand the dataType
dt:dataTypeLabel.title: Data Type Label

dt:baseDataType.description: This property specifies the subtype of abstract datatype for values on this attribute.

dt:dataTypeURI.description: identifier for the dataType definition; primitive types might be defined in various vocabularies, but other dataType Categories should provide URIs for dataType definitions that offer representations using this dataType schema.
dt:dataTypeURI.title: Primitive Type URI

oneOf.title: Link to Concept in this repository
Value type definition
oneOf.description: if the attribute values are not primitive types (blob, boolean, integer,date, date-time, real-number, string), then can provide reference link to a data type definition that details structure of list, dictionary, data object, or array values.

dt:attributeComponentContainer.title: Component of a container object:
dt:attributeComponentContainer.description: identifier for the meaning concept of a container object for this attribute. Use when an attribute in a data object is a component in a complex object whose properties have been indcorporated into the data object. For instance  a point location object has {latitue, longitude, SRS} properties, but typically a point location is implemented by putting these fields in a data object, not putting in a point location object. This construct is useful if someone is searching for content that has a property represented by the container object, e.g. find all datasets that have geographically located observations.

dt:componentMeaning.description: this is a convienence, link directly to meaning property of container object, to facilitate query.
dt:componentMeaning.title: Semantics:

dt:attributeValueDomain.title: Domain of values
dt:attributeValueDomain.description: by reference only, link to definition of domain restriction for values of this attribute

oneOf.title: Link to Data object definition registered in this repository

dt:attributeUOM.description: specification of units of measure used to assign values for this property; only applies if the data type is a primitive numeric type
dt:attributeUOM.title: Unit of measure

dt:attributeUOM-URI.description: identifier for a data type (objectClass) entity concept
dt:attributeUOM-URI.title: Property Concept URI

oneOf.title: Link to Units of measure definition registered in this repository
